caption.title: Population-level impact of ART on HIV incidence, as a function of the model parameters (one-way analysis).
caption.p:
Notes: The impact of ART on HIV incidence is defined as the relative change in the HIV incidence rate, associated with ART ( I/ I
noART âˆ’ 1). An ART impact of 0 thus indicates no effects of ART on HIV incidence, whereas an ART impact of -1 indicates that ART eliminates HIV incidence.
